RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui doutorado em Elementary Particle Physics - International School for Advanced Studies (2010). Foi Postdoc no Yukawa Institute YITP em Kyoto ( JP ) e na USP em So Paulo. Atualmente postdoc no International Institute of Physics em Natal. Tem experincia na rea de Fsica, com nfase em Fsica Terica e Teoria das Cordas
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: PhD at Elementary Particle Physics from International School for Advanced Studies (2010). Postdocs in the YITP in Kyoto, USP in So Paulo and presently in the IIP in Natal. Has experience in Physics, focusing on Theoretical Physics and String Theory
